enum Computer {

}

var chip = Computer.cpu(core: 8, ghz: 3.1)

switch chip {
case .cpu(let a, let b):

case let .ram(a, _):

enum SomeEnum {

case .some(let value):

	case .right:

case .none:

for case let .some(number) in arrays {

}

}

ì˜µì…”ë„ íŒ¨í„´ (Optional Pattern)
